column4: Does anyone know of a good tutorial of how to deploy a file server and have desktop machines connect to it to transfer file to and from. I also need Remote Desktop to be able to run. I'm setting up a computer lab
You need samba for the file server.  And, Applications -> Internet -> Terminal Server Client for the remote access into Windows boxes.
ssh, vnc, xdmcp are UNIX to UNIX options for remote access
I think ssh is the easiest to set up, but having Samba setup is going to be the easiest for users to use.
